message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
Hi Alice,  I appreciate you offering the product but $20,000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for it, which is the maximum I can afford. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is my bottom line.  I'm willing to let it go for that price, but I can't go any lower.
